## isObject() function

检查值是否是对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isObject(value: any): value is Record<any, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is Record&lt;any, any&gt;
